question: ‘Ultimate Cycling Challenge’, that was seen in news recently, has been flagged off in which state/UT?
explanation:
The Lieutenant Governor of Ladkah R. K. Mathur flagged off Ultimate Ladakh Cycling Challenge in Leh, Ladakh.
Regarded as one of the toughest cycling challenges in the world, it is held at an altitude of over 17 thousand feet. Ladakh Police, Ladakh Tourism Department in association with the Cycling Federation of India and Ladakh Cycling Association are organising the four-day event.
